headline: Revlon Appoints Beauty Industry Powerhouse Amber Garrison to Lead Elizabeth Arden and Global Fragrance Portfolio
summary: NEW YORK, September 25, 2025--As Elizabeth Arden marks its 115th anniversary, Revlon is proud to announce the appointment of beauty powerhouse Amber Garrison as the new leader of the Elizabeth Arden brand and global Fragrance category. She joins at a pivotal moment, bringing unmatched energy, vision, and expertise to a brand that has defined beauty innovation for over a century.

headline: AVEDA and Keracol Limited Collaboration on Novel Hair Color Tracking Method Published in Peer-Reviewed Journal Heliyon, Advancing Hair Dye Science
summary: MINNEAPOLIS, September 25, 2025--Aveda, recognized globally for its leadership in sustainable innovation in hair care, together with Keracol Limited — a company founded by academic researchers specializing in color chemistry and sustainability at the University of Leeds — has announced the publication of their groundbreaking research in the peer-reviewed journal Heliyon1.

headline: Revlon Taps Estée Lauder Alum to Lead Fragrance Division, Elizabeth Arden Brand
summary: Amber Garrison has been named president of the company's global fragrance portfolio and its Elizabeth Arden brand.
